descriptionHtml:
[center]Sorry, English is not my native Language. So I don't understand well the meaning of comments. :'(

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59419-1-1414390842.jpg[/img]

Feature:
-Adds a female follower. Her name is Yeriel.
-This is a Standalone mod.

Follower Info:
-Name : Yeriel
-Sex : Female
-Body : UNP (I don't have a plan to upload the CBBE version)
-CombatStyle : Flame Magic + One-handed Sword
-Location: 'Silver-Blood Inn' in Markarth
-Spell: Flame Cloak, Conjure Flame Atronach, Firebolt, Incinerate, Stoneflesh
-Perk:
Sneak - Light Foot
Onehanded - Armsman, Fighting Stance, Savage Strike
Light Armor - Agile Defender, Unhindered, Deft Movement
Destruction - Apprentice Destruction, Adept Destruction, Expert Destruction, Augmented Flames
Alteration - Apprentice Alteration, Mage Armor
Conjuration - Apprentice Conjuration Summoner, Atromancy
-Essential, Marriage possible

[youtube]Wdwy53ffBsE[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url]. Thank you! :D

Recommended mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by hellosanta (If you dress her in other clothes, I recommend this mod to solve the neckline trouble)

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by hellosanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58163]Zoe's Body UNP normal map[/url] by zacki
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=267424761&searchtext=Radioreggae]Radioreggae's Hair Workshop 2[/url] by Radioreggae
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641]Ravens Warpaint[/url] by t56yr
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652]Eldrids Armor Mashup UNP[/url] by anka01
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909]Sotteta Huntress Armor UNP[/url] by Deserter X
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14192]Animated enchantment effects[/url] by foster xbl
Female face textures by Gonzo

Thanks everyone!! :D

History Log:
2014.10.27 v1.0 Released
2014.10.28 v1.1 Fix mod. Adds no warpaint version
2015.01.21 v1.2 Modify the name of the door

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59362]Follower - Bella[/url] (Adds a standalone female darkelf follower 'Bella')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59970]Followers of Aber[/url] (Adds 3 standalone female followers)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61937]Males of Skyrim[/url] (Replaces the appearance of some males)[/center]
author: Aberin
